channel.title: I could really use help here
channel.description:
so guys i have discovered a few bugs in my server: 1.there are npcs (kalphite to be exact) that i put in my autospawn.cfg but won't show they are all near the kalphite queen but only the queen is showing!! anyone know what i do??
2. in the tz tok shop thing when i click an item to check it's value it says *item name* currently costs 5 coins *item name* currently costs 5 tokkul and when i buy it and i don't have coins or tokkul in my inventory it says you don't have enough coins and when i try to buy when i don't have tokkul but have coins in my inventory it says you don't have enough tokkul
3.in pest control when you are killing a portal and another player comes(in another turn) it resets the portals hp!
any help with these would be great :o PS: i tried to fix the shops bug i deleted the shops id from the *if* that requires coins but it is still giving me the messages above

item.title: I could really use help here
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

so guys i have discovered a few bugs in my server:
1.there are npcs (kalphite to be exact) that i put in my autospawn.cfg but won’t show they are all near the kalphite queen but only the queen is showing!! anyone know what i do??

  1. in the tz tok shop thing when i click an item to check it’s value it says
    item name currently costs 5 coins
    item name currently costs 5 tokkul
    and when i buy it and i don’t have coins or tokkul in my inventory it says you don’t have enough coins
    and when i try to buy when i don’t have tokkul but have coins in my inventory it says you don’t have enough tokkul

3.in pest control when you are killing a portal and another player comes(in another turn) it resets the portals hp!

any help with these would be great :o
PS: i tried to fix the shops bug i deleted the shops id from the if that requires coins but it is still giving me the messages
above
